qas.question: Mahayana schools recognize all or part of what?
A few of the sutras for Mahayanists became a manifestation of who?
Faith in and veneration of Mahayana are stated in what sutras?

answers.text: Lotus Sutra and the Mahaparinirvana Sutra

context: Mahayana schools recognize all or part of the <a0_0>Mahayana Sutras<a0_0/>. Some of these sutras became for Mahayanists a manifestation of <a1_0>the Buddha<a1_0/> himself, and faith in and veneration of those texts are stated in some sutras (e.g. the <a2_0>Lotus Sutra and the Mahaparinirvana Sutra<a2_0/>) to lay the foundations for the later attainment of Buddhahood itself.
